import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Data
genres = ["religious art", "portrait", "history painting"]

plt.xlabel('Genre')
plt.ylabel('Number of Appearances')
plt.xticks(rotation=45)
plt.tight_layout()

# Save the plot
